channel.title: Tales from the shell
channel.description: Recent content on Tales from the shell

item.title: About me
item.description: Who are you? My name is Nick, though many online also know me as “thewebguy” I’m a technologist, current sysadmin (totally not a bofh I promise), free and open source software advocate, and lover of the outdoors. Tales from the shell is my personal blog where I share interesting tell stories from the IT field, share security blunders and tips, lessons, and and discuss current events. When I’m not wrangling servers I like to spend a lot of time outdoors and probably spend as much time, if not more, in the woods than I do in front of a terminal.
